title: Siloam and Jerusalem, Southeastern Corner of the Walls Seen from the Mount of Olives [Jerusalem,and Silwan, East Jerusalem, Israel]
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of the countryside with boulders and gnarled olive trees on slopes, Siloam in the center middleground and the Dome of the Rock on the Mount Zion in the right background.

Verso:  an account
name: Drawing
